dnsDomains.description: DNSDomains is a list of DNS domains that are permitted or excluded.

emailAddresses.description: EmailAddresses is a list of Email Addresses that are permitted or excluded.

ipRanges.description: IPRanges is a list of IP Ranges that are permitted or excluded. This should be a valid CIDR notation.

uriDomains.description: URIDomains is a list of URI domains that are permitted or excluded.
